thread.section_title: Hotel Ekta - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Springbreak Vacation
thread.title_full: Springbreak Vacation - Review of Hotel Ekta, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Vu H
title: Springbreak Vacation
text:
One of the best hotel experiences my family has had. Boutique hotel but rooms were very spacious and clean as well as well designed. My wife, kids and I can't say enough about the hotel and the staff, particularly Juodi and Christopher! They made sure that our stay was the most enjoyable experience possible! Will definitely stay here again!
Vu
